title: 【解密】FORGET THE RULES|忘掉规则|1.11.2|MINEMAKERS TEAM
author: Xiao_Tao_Zi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-7 22:14 编辑 


简介 DescriptionForget the Rules will propose you 40 illogical puzzles to solve!To do this task, you'll have to do the reverse of what you think... Forget the basic rules of a basic game!Traps, fake levels, endless loop... Everything there want to make you ragequit! A button? Don't click on it! A gold ingot? Don't pick it up!The patience will be your only friend!But no worry! If you're trapped, you'll get tips to help you... Unless...The map is made for 1 player but it can be played with 2 or 3 players. But some effects will be spoilt!忘掉规则会含有40个不合逻辑的关卡等你来破解！要完成这项任务，你需要来做你想做的事...忘掉基础的游戏规则（开创造能吗？）陷阱，假的关卡，无尽的循环... 所有东西都会令你想要怒砸电脑！一个按钮？别按它！一个金锭？别拿起来！耐心会是你唯一的朋友不过不要紧张！如果你被困住了，你可以拿到一些提示... 除非...地图是为了1人而制造的，但是也可以2~3人游玩。但是一些特效就泡汤了！
图片 Pictures





下载 Downlaod国内网盘：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1bUL4nk原贴：http://www.minecraftmaps.com/puzzle-maps/forget-the-rules
